Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Most calls about the top 20 didn’t involve criminal behavior, but instead disorderly conduct, disputes and disturbances often linked to alcohol and drug use or mental health issues, municipal statistics show.
Document Sources.Source Justification: municipal statistics; When local police studied the nearly 29,000 calls they’ve received in the past three years, they discovered the 20 people most cited for problems accounted for 1,700 — or 6% — of all complaints.
